subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dan Giese of the Yankees pitched pretty well Saturday in his first major league start, but his crucial fielding mistake got him in trouble late in the game and led to a victory by the Cincinnati Reds.
snippet: Dan Giese of the Yankees pitched pretty well Saturday in his first major league start, but his crucial fielding mistake got him in trouble late in the game and led to a victory by the Cincinnati Reds.
